name: autodocstring-path-manager
description: Effortlessly manage and customize your docstring templates with the AutoDocstring Template Manager. This extension allows you to set platform-specific template paths, display the current template path in the status bar, and quickly update the path with a simple command. Whether you are working on Windows, macOS, or Linux, this extension ensures your docstring templates are always correctly configured for seamless code documentation.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
